labels.value: src.test.resources.features.api.BookingByCustomer_feature.As a Customer I should be able to make table reservations so I could visit the Restaurant on a preferred time slots.

name: Verify unsuccessful creation of a booking due to time to that is not valid

steps.name: When the user sends a POST request to the end point for booking a table "table-204" for "5" people from "17:00" to "" at location "location-002"
Then the response status code must be 400
And the response message should be "Wrong time slot selected"
